headline: 3 retail stock picks as Trump's trade deadline looms
summary: President Trump's "Liberation Day" tariff pause expires Wednesday, reigniting investor worries about trade uncertainty. Oppenheimer managing director and senior analyst Brian Nagel explains why AutoZone (AZO), CarMax (KMX), and Life Time (LTH) are among the best-positioned retail names. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.
